alert.note: Alert for Arthur; Garden; Grant (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 3:51PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Arthur, southwestern Grant and northeastern Garden Counties through 330 PM MDT... At 251 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 18 miles northwest of Arthur, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sand Puddin Lake, Velma, Haythorn Lake, Jensen Lake and Bourquim Hill. This includes Highway 61 between mile markers 128 and 140. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
